pullrequest.title: Fix up pkg-config and cmake files when falling back to ignition-math3.

content.raw: All right.  With @scpeters latest changes, the CI succeeds on MacOS.  There is still the failure on Windows, but that is going to be fixed elsewhere.  Thus, with the CI blue, and with approvals, I'm going to merge this.
content.html: All right. With @scpeters latest changes, the CI succeeds on MacOS. There is still the failure on Windows, but that is going to be fixed elsewhere. Thus, with the CI blue, and with approvals, I'm going to merge this.
